snippet.title: Monster Racing League Steam Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Monster Racing League is a multiplayer strategic racing game. Monsters drive themselves while players time their use of offensive and defensive abilities to disrupt their opponents and give themselves an edge in the race. Races are short, hectic, sometimes reckless, but always fun!
Coming soon to Steam Early Access!
